name: Note Alone
description:
Note Alone is game with gameplay of tower defense and little of roguelite elements. The thing for you is to survive the most time.

Nothing more than your towers only can save you.

Content of the game in the version 1.2:

  • 3 beggining towers
  • 2 unlockable towers
  • 4 types of enemies

Supports static and dynamic joysticks, mouse, keyboard, touch. Begginers are advised to look through Learning in Settings to undestand the game.
